content: knitted jumper in drops lima or drops karisma the piece is worked top down with round yoke lace pattern ribbed edges and split in the sides sizes s - xxxl drops design pattern no li-136 yarn group b **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops lima from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 550-600-650-700-800-850 g colour 9021 brick red or use drops karisma from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 550-600-650-700-800-850 g colour 82 maroon needles drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 cm and 60-60-80-80-80-80 cm drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm and 60-60-80-80-80-80 cm drops double pointed needles size 4 mm drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge** 21 stitches in width and 28 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm
